name: 力學（二）
description: 本課程提供物理系大學部理論力學一般的題材。
goals: 培養學生物理的歸納及推演能力
訓練學生解析的計算能力
令學生了解力學的發展歷史
使學生注意最新的發展
syllabus:
We will follow closely the topics in the book "Classical dynamics of particles and systems" by Marion and Thornton (M & Th)

Weeks 1: Continuation of Lagrangian and Hamiltonian formulations of Mechanics (Chapter 7 of M & Th).

Week 2: Continuation of Lagrangian and Hamiltonian formulations of Mechanics（Chapter 7 of M & Th);  Central force (Chapter 8 of M & Th). 

Weeks 3, 4: Central force (Chapter 8 of M & Th).

Weeks 5, 6: Dynamics of system of particles (Chapter 9 of M & Th).

Weeks 7, 8: Motion in a non-inertial reference frame (Chapter 10 of M &Th) 

Week 9: Midterm exam; Date is subject to change.

Weeks 10, 11, 12: Dynamics of rigid body (Chapter 11 of M & Th).

Weeks 13 an 14: Coupled oscillation 1 (Chapter 12 of M & Th).

Weeks 15 and 16: Wave (Chapter 13 of M & Th).

Weeks 17: Final exam.

Remaining weeks: Assignments (自主學習) --> Special relativity (Chapter 14 of M & Th).

grading.note: There will be one midterm exam.
There will be one final exam.
